title: 2010년 Nash 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Nash. 판결일: 2010-11-12. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York ex rel. Miguel Bonilla v. Michael Nash, Acting Superintendent, Willard Drug Treatment Campus
**판결일**: 2010-11-12
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 78 A.D.3d 1604
- 910 N.Y.S.2d 709

## 판결문 요약


Appeal from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Seneca County (Dennis E Bender, A.J.), dated July 24, 2009 in a habeas corpus proceeding. The judgment ordered that petitioner be released from custody.
It is hereby ordered that the judgment so appealed from is unanimously reversed on the law without costs and the petition is dismissed (see People ex rel. Carson v Williams, 77 AD3d 1378 [2010]; People ex rel. Kavazanjian v Williams, 71 AD3d 1528 [2010]; People ex rel. Van Steenburg v Wasser, 69 AD3d 1135 [2010], lv denied in part and dismissed in part 14 NY3d 883 [2010]; People ex rel. Almodovar v Berbary, 67 AD3d 1419 [2009], lv denied 14 NY3d 703 [2010]). Present — Smith, J.P., Fahey, Bindley, Sconiers and Gorski, JJ.
...
